name: Pasta with Parmesan Tomato Sauce
instructions: Cut the onion, grate the carrot, and peel the garlic. Cook in a pan with 10 g of butter and some salt until translucent.
Add minced meat and cook until browned.
Mix the cooked vegetables with the tomato paste, take into mixer and mix until smooth paste
Pour back into casserole and cook until bubble start forming
Stir in heavy cream and simmer for 10–15 minutes.
Add cooked pasta and parmesan. Stir and serve.
